title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: So, back before I knew that the issue had already been discussed, I took it upon myself to uninstall and reinstall the game completely. Well, during that time, I kept receiving an error message stating that the PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. So I waited and just now, I tried it again, and yet once more, I have received the same error. Any insite on what I can do to resolve this issue?

replies.body: That's most likely happening due to League not having all of the correct admin settings in order to run properly. Double check you [**permissions settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that gets you back on the Rift!
